|brand = MikroTik |model = RouterBOARD cAP |submodelappend = yes |submodel = ac |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = RBcAPGi-5acD2nD |wlclass = AC1200 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = access point |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = TV7CPGI5ACD2ND |icid = 7442A-CPGI5ACD2ND |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 48RAAA0G.SGC |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm;IPQ4018;Q, IPQ4018, 0VV, NE649WJE, E064900; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A7 |cpu1spd = 716 <!-- 710 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NOR |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CC128M16IP-DI; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 64:D1:54 |oui = 64:D1:54
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = RouterBOOT |stockos = RouterOS;L4;;
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->
|pwr_volt_type = POE |pwr_poe_type = af/at |pwr_poe = 24 |pwr_poe_amp = 1.2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 3.3,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Wistron NeWeb |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 10/12/2017 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = 69 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Latvia
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1cpu = true |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |acqam2 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad2ac = 867 |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "MikroTik", "cAPG_5HacD2HnD" and "48RAAA0G.SGC" is silkscreened on the board.
26 dBm power, 2.0/2.5 dBi integrated Wi-Fi antennas
{{see also|MikroTik|Wistron NeWeb}}
*[[MikroTik RouterBOARD cAP ac (RBcAPGi-5acD2nD)]] :[https://mikrotik.com/product/cap_ac '''cAP ac'''] - FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TV7CPGI5ACD2ND TV7CPGI5ACD2ND] (2017-10-12) :2x GbE ports, PoE, Ceiling AP, Dual-Chain 2.4/5GHz, 802.3at/af :CPU: [[Qualcomm]] IPQ4018 @716MHz, 16/256MB, [http://lanmarket.ua/mikrotik/cap-ac-rbcapgi-5acd2nd/ 30dBm, 2dBi] {{FCC ST|02/18/2018|indexme.}}

==See also== *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD cAP (RBcAP-2nD)]] - 2.4GHz AP :[https://mikrotik.com/product/cap_ac '''cAP'''] - FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TV7RBCM2ND TV7RBCM2ND] (2016-08-09) :1x FE ports, Ceiling AP, Dual-Chain 2.4GHz, RouterOS L4, 802.3at/af :CPU: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9533 @650MHz, 16/64MB *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD cAP lite (RBcAPL-2nD)]] - 2.4GHz AP :[https://mikrotik.com/product/RBcAPL-2nD-307 RBcAPL-2nD] ('''cAP lite''') - FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TV7RBCAPL2ND TV7RBCAPL2ND] :1x FE ports, PoE, Ceiling AP, Dual-Chain 2.4GHz, RouterOS L4, 802.3at/af :CPU: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9533 @650MHz, 16/64MB, [http://lanmarket.ua/mikrotik/mikrotik-cap-lite-rbcapl-2nd-3965/ 22dBm, 1.5dBi] *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD hAP ac 2 (RBD52G-5HacD2HnD-TC)]] (US) :[https://mikrotik.com/product/hap_ac2 '''hAP ac2'''] (tower case) - FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TV7RBD52-5ACD2ND TV7RBD52-5ACD2ND] (2018-01-15) :5x GbE ports, PoE, USB 2.0, Wave 2 (2x2 2.4/5GHz) • [https://uloz.to/!KboRhNGccV6O/en-datasheet-hap-ac-2-tower-pdf PBrief] :CPU: [[Qualcomm]] IPQ4018 @716MHz, 16/128MB • [https://forum.mikrotik.com/viewtopic.php?t=129649 MT forum]
